name: Treasure Train
storyline: In the wave of gold rush in industrial age, you drive a steam train to a wonderful magical land where scattered with endless treasure.You should connect the tracks and gather these valuable gems and treasures by your train.There are 6 different realms on this magical land, namely Gem Forest, Treasure Mountain, Lost Desert, King's Land, Winter Fall and Crystal Caverns. You should explore these realms in order to complete the mission as a treasure hunter.In addition, on the road of your treasure hunt, there will be some dangerous clowns to make you in trouble, you should take care of them, do not let them crash your train.
summary: Rebuild the track in time to collect gems with your train! Plan your route and strategize your next move to keep your train on track, and collect as many gems as you can! Play in Realm Explore or Endless Mission mode and choose from three trains for different difficulty levels to customize your game play experience!
